reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Moving Towards Sustainable Epidemic Control of HIV/AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

description.narrative: Namibia - Multicomponent - Ministry of Health and Social Services of Namibia - MOH. This program has the following goals: To reduce new HIV infections and AIDS related mortality by 75% by 2022 from 2015 levels, and move towards ending AIDS as a public health threat by 2030. To reduce the national burden of TB by achieving fewer than 50 TB patients per 100,000 population by 2035. To achieve zero indigenous malaria cases in Namibia by 2022. The objectives of this program are: To reduce new HIV infections by 75% by 2023. To reduce HIV related deaths by 75% by 2023. To enroll and retain 100% of newly identified PLHIV on ART by 2023. To ensure 100% ART coverage among TB/HIV co-infected patients by 2023. To accelerate TB case detection and achieve universal drug susceptibility testing for TB by 2023. To manage all forms of TB, among all ages and including drug-resistant and drug-sensitive TB, and achieve a treatment success rate of 90% by 2025. To achieve zero indigenous malaria cases in Namibia by 2023

title.narrative: Impact indicator for NAM-Z-MOH
Reported malaria cases (presumed and confirmed)
Inpatient malaria deaths per year: rate per 100,000 persons per year
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
Malaria test positivity rate
Confirmed malaria cases (microscopy or RDT): rate per 1000 persons per year
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
TB incidence rate per 100,000 population
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Coverage / Output indicator for NAM-Z-MOH
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of young people aged 10-24 years attending school reached by compehensive sexuality education and/or life skills-based HIV education in schools
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment in the community
Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of adolescent girls and young women who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test at public sector health facilities
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test in the community
Number of long-lasting insecticidal nets distributed to at-risk populations through mass campaigns
Percentage of malaria foci fully investigated and classified
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
Percentage of children (under 15) on ART among all children living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines
Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Proportion of households in targeted areas that received Indoor Residual Spraying during the reporting period
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of eligible adolescent girls and young women who initiated oral antiretroviral PrEP during the reporting period
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment at public sector health facilities
Percentage of service delivery reports from community health workers integrated into HMIS
Percentage of adults (15 and above) on ART among all adults living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of medical male circumcisions performed according to national standards
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of PLHIV on ART who initiated TB preventive therapy among those eligible during the reporting period
Outcome indicator for NAM-Z-MOH
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Annual blood examination rate: per 100 population per year (Elimination settings)
Proportion of population with access to an ITN within their household
Percentage of other vulnerable populations who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse
Percentage of people living with HIV who know their HIV status at the end of the reporting period
Treatment success rate of all forms of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
